Package coupon.sys.core.dao.db

Class CompanyDaoDb

  • java.lang.Object
    • coupon.sys.core.dao.db.CompanyDaoDb
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CompanyDao

    public class CompanyDaoDb
extends Object
implements CompanyDao
    This class is a part of the DAO layer. The class which communicates between the company's object related methods and the data base through sql queries.
    Version:
    1.0 September 18, 2018.
    Author:
    Julio Hernan Trajtemberg

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      CompanyDaoDb​()
      Constructs the class that communicates with the db and initializes the pool variable with the Connection pool's instance.

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void createCompany​(Company company)
      Create Company, the method checks if the company already exists if it doesn't it crates it and if does throws exception

      Get all companies from Company table

      Get company from Company table by ID
      Collection<Coupon> getCoupons​(long id)
      Get all coupons from a Company on Coupon table
      Long login​(String name, String password)
      A method for login into the system through passing user name and password.
      void removeCompany​(Company company)
      Remove company from Company table and from Company_Coupon table Return connection to pool
      void updateCompany​(Company company)
      Update company password, email and name changes from Company table Return connection to pool

      • login

        public Long login​(String name,
                  String password)
           throws CompanyDaodbException,
                  ConnectionPoolException,
                  InterruptedException,
                  CryptoHashException
        A method for login into the system through passing user name and password. The password is validated by converting the users input into system hash encryptions used and matching the hash with the one already written on the DB
